code: import React from'react';import{Clock}from'lucide-react';import'./PendingHoursCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PendingHoursCard=_ref=>{let{totalPendingHours,totalHours,loading}=_ref;if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pending-hours-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-loading",children:"Loading..."})});}const formatNumber=num=>{if(num===null||num===undefined)return'0';return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US').format(num);};const progressPercent=totalHours>0?totalPendingHours/totalHours*100:0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pending-hours-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Clock,{size:18,className:"card-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:"TOTAL PENDING HOURS"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-value",children:formatNumber(totalPendingHours||0)}),totalHours>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-progress",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-fill",style:{width:"".concat(Math.min(progressPercent,100),"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-label",children:["Total: ",formatNumber(totalHours)]})]})]});};export default PendingHoursCard;
